title: Can't uncensor chat?
body: Basically title. Playing League, and the option to uncensor chat is just.... gone.... It was there before the update.. Now it's now..

replies.body: The chat filter option has moved! Click on the gear/cog button next to the X (close) button in the top-right hand corner of your client. Then under "Chat & Friends", toggle the "Enable Language Filter" option. Let me know if you need any help finding it!
